channel.title: Newsletter on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: What's New in March 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reporting tech signals: everything new on artificial intelligence, API techniques, toolings, programming languages, and the intersection of design and engineering.

item.title: What's New in February 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reporting Tech Signals - Latest findings on Serverless Computing, AI & ML, FinOps and CyberSecurity Research Topics 2024 - 40 topics on the most promising technologies.

item.title: What's New in January 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community.

item.title: What's New in November 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Last November, we kicked off the Labs team, introduced Salary Advance for the Dwarves, upgraded note.d.foundation, supported Golang meetup, and demonstrated craftsmanship through various case studies and demos.

item.title: What's New in October 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community.

item.title: Happy 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we enter a new year, I want to reflect on the role that software has played in my life. From the early days of my career to now, software has been a constant presence and something that I have dedicated countless hours to as both an engineer and project manager.

item.title: 2022 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Successfully went through 2022, a year that we might say - a new record: team reached highest growth record, kickstarted community engagement, home, compliance training & individual development are speeding up, and a whole new place to call Dwarves.

item.title: Dwarves Of The Year 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves of The Year 2022 - Wins to Celebrate It’s been a long journey, but we’ve finally made it to 2022 and what a year it’s been for our team of Dwarves.

item.title: The Next Leading Chairs
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our vision for growth Last Jan 2020, we got the chance to celebrate our first milestone - Dwarves Foundation reached 5 years old.

item.title: The future is blockchain and data
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It’s Han and Nikki here, Plus an extra fresh voice we’re bringing to Dwarves Updates, in hope we can offer you more engineering-related insights and thoughts.

item.title: The stages of hiring at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han and Nikki, back in your inbox for another Dwarves Updates. First, we are delighted to share that Dwarves placed top 100 in the Financial Times’ Asia-Pacific High-Growth Company.

item.title: What's New in January 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Project Highlights MStation as our latest blockchain-based project It’s the first BSCS Metaverse blockchain game on Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

item.title: What's New in December 2021
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Moving with Blockchain We shift our focus to real deals. Meanwhile, #blockchain #web3 channels are there for the Dwarves to learn & exchange their knowns.

item.title: Dwarves Of The Year 2021
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Apart from the team’s voting result for each title, the team leads also selected the Honorable Mention and Client Endorsed, as we want to honor all of the hard work.

item.title: It's a wrap: 2021 in Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, it’s Han and Nikki in your inbox again. On behalf of the entire Dwarves team, happy 2022! For us 2021 is eventful, and memorable.

item.title: Engineering organizational structure
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings, It’s Han and Nikki from Team Dwarves. We’re almost at the end of this year. While we know everyone is busy wrapping up 2021, we hope you’re taking care of yourself and staying safe.

item.title: The path to growth at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings, It’s Han and Nikki from Team Dwarves. We’re here with the fifth edition of our Dwarves Updates. October has been a wild ride for us as a company.

item.title: Engineer Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings, It’s Han and Nikki from Team Dwarves. Time does fly when we get to do something we love. As we keep working on building up the team and producing codes for our clients, we didn’t even notice it’s already the end of September.

item.title: Project Compliance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han & Nikki from Team Dwarves. This email is the third month we share about our journey to Software Craftsmanship.

item.title: Da Lat Office
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han and the Dwarves team again. We work as a borderless software firm by crafting world-class products that bring great impacts for various industries.

item.title: Dwarves Updates
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hi, this is Han, the CEO of Dwarves Foundation. This month the Dwarves score 40th client that we have the honor to serve.

item.title: 2020 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Wrapping up 2019 with the first 5th-year milestone, many ideas popped up for the next steps. Heading into a new decade means we get to wrap up the old and in with the new.

item.title: 2019 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Another year has gone by. And we just celebrated the 5th year that we survived all the challenges. Everyone was facing their own, but I have seen many of you reaching new stages and achieve new targets.

item.title: 2018 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2018 was the memorable year with lots of achievements. We adapted the new team structure. We defined things we value and live that culture tediously.
